Set up
```{r}
create_dataset <- function(size=10000, p_true = c(0.5, 0.2, 0.1, 0.1, 0.1),
                           names = c("Damjan", "Alex", "Jacky", "Water Bottle"
                                     , "Double Cheeseburger")){
  Yn = rep(names, size*p_true)
  return (Yn)
}

```
